refnamediv.refpurpose: Calls qunif function defined on R which takes r(size of vector), V(a vector of probabilities of size r), min and max as input parameters and the result is the quantile uniform distribution value for each element in the given vector

listitem.para: V : a vector of probabilities of size r
min : minimum value of the distribution
max : maximum value of the distribution

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calls the qunif() function in R that takes r, V, min and max as the input arguments and returns the quantile uniform distribution value for each element in the given vector.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // qunif on r, V, min and max y = qunif(5, [0,0.2,0.5,0.7,1], 3, 7)

simplelist.member: Mohana N (Assistant Professor, SAS, Division of Mathematics, VIT Chennai)
